page.title: 07Churches in Lawshall Area.
page.content: At Lawshall Parish Church is a Sunday School which is held in the adjacent school and is well supported. There is also a Free Church, built 15 years ago of modern style,with good facilities and central heating, including a room for church social functions,a kitchen & Sunday School room. With well attended Sunday Services,it also offers weekly Bible classses,Prayer meetings, Teen- ager's club and summer holiday club for children. Our third place of Worship is at Chadacre Agricultural Institute Shimpling, it is mainly for the staff and resident students, but once a year usually at Harvest, they invite the local villagers to a service. At this time, the chapel is always full to capacity. This is a new building which is well maiained.
